derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be soft;
outline:
1. internal organs, inward parts, bowels, intestines, belly
    1. inward parts
    2. digestive organs
    3. organs of procreation, womb
    4. place of emotions or distress or love (fig.)
    5. external belly
strongs_def: used only in plural the intestines, or (collectively) the abdomen, figuratively, sympathy; by implication, a vest; by extension the stomach, the uterus (or of men, the seat of generation), the heart (figuratively)
